languages.text: "Только не я, прошу вас. Кто послушает придворную девицу, еще вчера выносившую ночные горшки?!" {n}Поняв, что сболтнула лишнего, Мейв густо краснеет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Только не я, прошу вас. Кто послушает придворную девицу, еще вчера выносившую ночные горшки?!" {n}Поняв, что сболтнула лишнего, Мейв густо краснеет.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Только не я, прошу вас. Кто послушает придворную девицу, еще вчера выносившую ночные горшки?!" {n}Поняв, что сболтнула лишнего, Мейв густо краснеет.{/n}

languages.text: “求您了，别让我当，除了我之外谁都可以！我最近才进了宫廷，以前只是个倒夜壶的女佣，有谁会听我的话呢？”{n}梅芙意识到自己说得太多了，立刻涨红了脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “求您了，别让我当，除了我之外谁都可以！我最近才进了宫廷，以前只是个倒夜壶的女佣，有谁会听我的话呢？”{n}梅芙意识到自己说得太多了，立刻涨红了脸。{/n}

languages.text: 「私は止めてください。私以外の誰かにしてください。おまけに、元おまる掃除の下働きだったような新参者の言うことなど、誰が聞くでしょうか？」{n}メイヴは、自分が言いすぎたことに気づき、顔を真っ赤にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は止めてください。私以外の誰かにしてください。おまけに、元おまる掃除の下働きだったような新参者の言うことなど、誰が聞くでしょうか？」{n}メイヴは、自分が言いすぎたことに気づき、顔を真っ赤にした。{/n}

languages.text: «Por favor, yo no. Cualquiera menos yo. ¿Quién iba a escuchar a una cortesana advenediza que se dedicaba a vaciar orinales?». {n}Maive se sonroja profundamente al comprender que ha hablado más de la cuenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por favor, yo no. Cualquiera menos yo. ¿Quién iba a escuchar a una cortesana advenediza que se dedicaba a vaciar orinales?». {n}Maive se sonroja profundamente al comprender que ha hablado más de la cuenta.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne olur ben olmayayım. Benden başka kim olursa olsun! Eskiden sıradan bir hizmetçi olan bir saray türedisine kim itaat eder ki?" {n}Maive, çok konuştuğunu fark edince kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne olur ben olmayayım. Benden başka kim olursa olsun! Eskiden sıradan bir hizmetçi olan bir saray türedisine kim itaat eder ki?" {n}Maive, çok konuştuğunu fark edince kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Pitié, pas moi ! N'importe qui d'autre. Qui écoutera une parvenue qui n'était autrefois qu'une femme de chambre ? » {n}Maive se rend compte qu'elle en a trop dit et rougit violemment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, pas moi ! N'importe qui d'autre. Qui écoutera une parvenue qui n'était autrefois qu'une femme de chambre ? » {n}Maive se rend compte qu'elle en a trop dit et rougit violemment.{/n}

languages.text: "Bitte nicht mich. Jeden, aber nicht mich! Wer würde schon auf einen Emporkömmling am Hof hören, der früher Nachttopfmädchen war?" {n}Maive errötet, als sie erkennt, dass sie zu viel gesagt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Please, not me. Anyone but me. Who would listen to a court upstart who used to be a chamberpot maid?" {n}Maive blushes profusely as she realises she has said too much.{/n}
